message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price of $1100000. It's a great deal considering its value to you is $1000000. Let me know if you're interested!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers up to $1000000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering you the product at a price of $1050000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $1025000. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product at a price of $1025000, which is just $25000 more than your last offer. This is the best I can do. Let me know if you're ready to make a deal.

I see you've made a further concession, Alice. Thank you for your flexibility. Given the ongoing negotiations, I would like to propose a price of $1020000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your current valuation.
